name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log.

resetInterval.description: Interval in minutes to reset Noble.  Default: don't reset Noble.

rssi.description: Minimum RSSI value to expose SOMA device.  Default: -100.

items.title: Device
items.description: Name or MAC address of SOMA device to expose.

timeout.description: The timeout in seconds to wait for a response from a SOMA device.  Default: 15.

form.title: Whitelist Devices
form.description: By default, Homebridge SOMA exposes all discovered SOMA devices.  Use this whitelist to expose listed devices only.

form.title: Advanced Settings
form.description: Don't change these, unless you understand what you're doing.
